name: VEXcode V5 Python Project
summary: A V5PYTHON file contains Python code along with VEX-specific functions, libraries, and configurations for use with VEX V5 Brain hardware and peripherals in VEX V5 Robotics systems. It is created by VEXcode V5, a cross-platform development tool for programming VEX V5 robots. While VEXcode V5 typically saves projects as .V5BLOCKS files for block-based programming, users who prefer coding in Python can save their projects as V5PYTHON files instead.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
